Control.Name: DrawUpdateControls
Control.Tooltip: The amount of time between screen redraws.

Control.Name: FastUpdateControls
Control.Tooltip: The amount of time between the updates for units close to the player.

Control.Name: SlowUpdateControl
Control.Tooltip: The amount of time between the updates for units far from the player.

Control.Name: DefaultButton
Control.Tooltip: Restores the settings back to default.

Control.Name: LimitByLabel
Control.Tooltip: Determines how the max for each item is calculated. Valid options are nil, quest, challlenge, and category. nil - unlimited. quest - limits per quest. challenge - limits per challenge. category - limits per category.

Control.Text: This probably needs to be a drop down list
Control.Name: FontText
DisplayLabel
Control.Tooltip: If this value is set, the display name will be used in place of the unit's name.

Control.Name: DisplayText
Control.Tooltip: If this value is set, the display name will be used in place of the unit's name.

Control.Name: ZDistanceText
Control.Tooltip: Determines how the max for each item is calculated. Valid options are nil, quest, challlenge, and category. nil - unlimited. quest - limits per quest. challenge - limits per challenge. category - limits per category.
